result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Michael Joseph Taylor

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
Activity: Adjourned initial appearance (AIA)
Appearances by video/zoom: Court Official, Court Reporter, Court Clerk, and all Parties referenced in hearing minutes as in court.

4:06 PM Defendant Michael Joseph Taylor appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Walter H Isaacson appeared by video for Michael Joseph Taylor.  Prosecuting attorney David Zarwell appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant's attorney pleads not guilty and jury trial to be set.
Adjourned initial appearance on September 7, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Justice Point: Rock County Pretrial Risk Report

3:00 PM Defendant Michael Joseph Taylor in court, in custody from the Rock County Jail.  Attorney Ryan W O'Hara appeared by video for Michael Joseph Taylor.  Prosecuting attorney David S Olson appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Complaint filed, copy to defendant, charges and penalties advised, rights given, reading waived. Address verified. Court orders $250 Signature Bond with conditions: No contact directly or indirectly with victim C.T., his/her residence, place of employment, vehicle, or elsewhere. No contact with 3222 Humes Road in Janesville. Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 7, 2022 at 1:00 PM.
No contact directly or indirectly with victim C.T., his/her residence, place of employment, vehicle, or elsewhere. No contact with property at 3222 Humes Road.
